citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55 pm on
Tuesday, January 13, 2026. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling all 3 numbers, texting, and honking
at the facility. There was no way to access the door to the property to knock on. The inspector waited until 1:32 pm to
leave the property and placed a "Sorry we missed you" notice on the lock of the side gate. No phone calls were returned
during the waiting period. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55 pm on 
Tuesday, January 13, 2026. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling all 3 numbers, texting, and honking 
at the facility. There was no way to access the door to the property to knock on. The inspector waited until 1:32 pm to 
leave the property and placed a "Sorry we missed you" notice on the lock of the side gate. No phone calls were returned 
during the waiting period. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
